Identification.ShortTitle: Energy Administration Act Sections 53 to 65 Non-application Order, 1986
Identification.LongTitle: Order Declaring Sections 53 to 65 of the Energy Administration Act To Be Non-Applicable in Respect of any Producer-Province

Provision.Text: Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Energy, Mines and Resources, pursuant to subsection 52(1.1)* of the Energy Administration Act**, is pleased hereby to make the annexed Order declaring sections 53 to 65 of the Energy Administration Act to be non-applicable in respect of any producer-province, effective November 1, 1986.

Section.Text: This Order may be cited as the Energy Administration Act Sections 53 to 65 Non-application Order, 1986.
Sections 53 to 65 of the Energy Administration Act do not apply in respect of any producer-province.
